name: docker-manager
description: Docker Infrastructure Management Suite - unified web UI and REST API for platforms, projects, networks, servers, repositories, and automation on Synology NAS

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=api & npm run dev --workspace=web
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=api && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.start: npm run start --workspace=api & npm run start --workspace=web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=api && npm run lint --workspace=web
